|---|---|---|---|---|
| [AzureActivity](/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/AzureActivity)<p>Entries from the Azure Activity log that provides insight into any subscription-level or management group level events that have occurred in Azure. | resources, audit, security | LogManagement | No| [Yes](/azure/azure-monitor/reference/queries/azureactivity)|
| [WOUserAudits](/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/WOUserAudits)<p>Contains all workload orchestration API Server audit logs including the events generated as a result of interactions with any external system or toolchain. These events are useful for monitoring all the interactions with the workload orchestration API server and between workload orchestration and external orchestrated targets, e.g. Kubernetes. Requires Diagnostic Settings to use the Resource Specific destination table. | audit, resources | LogManagement | Yes| [Yes](/azure/azure-monitor/reference/queries/wouseraudits)|
| [WOUserDiagnostics](/azure/azure-monitor/reference/tables/WOUserDiagnostics)<p>Contains all workload orchestration API Server user diagnostics logs. These events are useful for diagnose failed requests on workload orchestration. Requires Diagnostic Settings to use the Resource Specific destination table. | resources | LogManagement | Yes| [Yes](/azure/azure-monitor/reference/queries/wouserdiagnostics)|
